text: Salavat Yulayev () is a 1940 Soviet drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Киностудия им. М. Горького отметила столетие, заложив собственную Аллею звезд It stars Arslan Muboryakov, Mikhail Bolduman, and Sergei Blinnikov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1940 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Salavat Yulayev (movie)
